column4: However, now, when I reinstalled OS. I just can't visit my home
Can someone tell me how to deal with this situation?
But now, How can I rescue my data?
unless you have your home partition backuped bit by bit (with dd) you have lost this data
encryption is exactly for that - so anyone, including you, can not acces data if one has no key
I think I know the password if I have set it.
follow HOWTO you have been given. (Manual mount)
well... Something is different... When I created that partition, my system is ubuntu. But now, it is fedora. Must I install a ubuntu again?
I do not know fedora enough to give you answer. In theory they should use same techniqe as ubuntu does.
find similar HOWTO in fedora docs and compare by self.
I have mount my /home successfully. Thank you very much!
